name: Overlord With A Slingshot (VR) #GGJ19
description: All the cosmic fuel of an alien homeworld has drained up because aliens forgot to mine it from other planets. All planet trapped inside. They pray to an overlord for redemption but overlord came up with a crazy plan. Maybe aliens have no fuel but they still have saucers. Overlord made a giant, saucer throwing slingshot and send them into space to get fuel. Players should make right desicions to use physics and handle resource management to get fuel their homeland.
